allocate(bytes,address).details: The encoded '_data' will be determined by the strategy implementation. Only 'Allo' contract can      call this when it is initialized.

params._data: The data to use to allocate to the recipient

distribute(address[],bytes,address).details: The encoded '_data' will be determined by the strategy implementation. Only 'Allo' contract can      call this when it is initialized.

params._data: The data to use to distribute to the recipients

getPayouts(address[],bytes[]).details: The encoded '_data' will be determined by the strategy implementation.

params._data: The data to use to get the payout summary for the recipients

returns._0: The payout summary for the recipients

increaseMaxRequestedAmount(uint256).details: 'msg.sender' must be a pool manager to update the max requested amount.

params._maxRequestedAmount: The max requested amount to be set

increasePoolAmount(uint256).details: Increases the 'poolAmount' by '_amount'. Only 'Allo' contract can call this.

params._amount: The amount to increase the pool by

initialize(uint256,bytes).custom:data: (bool useRegistryAnchor; uint64 allocationStartTime,    uint64 allocationEndTime, uint256 approvalThreshold, uint256 maxRequestedAmount)
initialize(uint256,bytes).details: This will revert if the strategy is already initialized and 'msg.sender' is not the 'Allo' contract.

returns._0: 'true' if the pool is active, otherwise 'false'

isValidAllocator(address).details: How the allocator is determined is up to the strategy implementation.

params._allocator: The address to check if it is a valid allocator for the strategy.

returns._0: 'true' if the address is a valid allocator, 'false' otherwise

registerRecipient(bytes,address).details: Registers a recipient and returns the ID of the recipient. The encoded '_data' will be determined by the      strategy implementation. Only 'Allo' contract can call this when it is initialized.

params._data: The data to use to register the recipient

setApprovalThreshold(uint256).details: 'msg.sender' must be a pool manager to update the approval threshold.

params._approvalThreshold: The approval threshold to be set

updatePoolTimestamps(uint64,uint64).details: The timestamps are in milliseconds for the start and end times. The 'msg.sender' must be a pool manager.      Emits a 'TimestampsUpdated()' event.

params._allocationEndTime: The end time for the allocation
params._allocationStartTime: The start time for the allocation

allocated(address,address).notice: Mapping to track if an allocator has voted/allocated to a recipient

allocationStartTime().notice: The timestamps in milliseconds for the allocation start and end time.

approvalThreshold().notice: The approval threshold for a recipient to be accepted.

constructor.notice: Constructor for the Micro Grants Strategy

getPayouts(address[],bytes[]).notice: Gets the payout summary for recipients.

getRecipientStatus(address).notice: Getter for the status of a recipient.

isPoolActive().notice: Getter for whether or not the pool is active.

isValidAllocator(address).notice: Checks if the '_allocator' is a valid allocator.

maxRequestedAmount().notice: The max amount that can be requested by a recipient.

updatePoolTimestamps(uint64,uint64).notice: Sets the allocation start and end dates.

withdraw(address).notice: Withdraw the tokens from the pool
